MS.S: Module for creating and displaying Toast Notifications on Microsoft Windows 10.

# 0.8.5_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Actually implement the ability to use a UniqueIdentifier with the Remove-BTNotification function (which was half implemented in 0.8.4)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.4_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Enhancement: Header ID on New-BTHeader is now optional. An ID will be auto generated if not specified (#125)_x000D__x000A_ * Thanks [@glennsarti](https://github.com/glennsarti)_x000D__x000A_* Enhancement: Hero images can now be specified using the New-BurntToastNotification function using the -HeroImage parameter (#80)_x000D__x000A_ * Thanks [@UniverseCitiz3n](https://github.com/UniverseCitiz3n)_x000D__x000A_* Enhancement: AppIDs can now be specified using the New-BurntToastNotification function using the -AppId parameter._x000D__x000A_ * Thanks [@cedarbaum](https://github.com/cedarbaum)_x000D__x000A_* Enhancement: You can now specify a UniqueIdentifier when using the Remove-BTNotification function rather than component Tag and Group strings._x000D__x000A_* Fix: Weird edge cases when taking text from Twitch/IRC and using them in a toast is now sorted._x000D__x000A_ * Thanks [@potatoqualitee](https://github.com/potatoqualitee) and [@vexx32](https://github.com/vexx32)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix: Error when running Update-BTNotification on PowerShell 6.0+ (#120)_x000D__x000A_* Fix: Error when using actionable toast parameters on any version (#122)_x000D__x000A_* Fix: Multiple warnings about events not being supported when specifying multiple event types._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Add: AdaptiveGroups are now usable via New-BTColumn_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix: Toast alias removed in 0.8.0 has been restored_x000D__x000A_* Deprecation: Signalling removal of Shoulder Tap cmdlets in future version, v0.9.0_x000D__x000A_* Deprecation: Signalling removal of Path parameter from New-BTAudio in future version, v0.9.0. https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/windows-uwp/issues/1593_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix: Images from UNC path failing (#111)_x000D__x000A_* Add: Ability to force a refresh of cached images via IgnoreCache switch on New-BTImage_x000D__x000A_* Add: ACTIONABLE NOTIFICATIONS! Exposed via ActivatedAction and DismissedAction parameters on Submit-BTNotification and New-BurntToastNotification
Module for creating and displaying Toast Notifications on Microsoft Windows 10.

# 0.8.5_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Actually implement the ability to use a UniqueIdentifier with the Remove-BTNotification function (which was half implemented in 0.8.4)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.4_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Enhancement: Header ID on New-BTHeader is now optional. An ID will be auto generated if not specified (#125)_x000D__x000A_ * Thanks [@glennsarti](https://github.com/glennsarti)_x000D__x000A_* Enhancement: Hero images can now be specified using the New-BurntToastNotification function using the -HeroImage parameter (#80)_x000D__x000A_ * Thanks [@UniverseCitiz3n](https://github.com/UniverseCitiz3n)_x000D__x000A_* Enhancement: AppIDs can now be specified using the New-BurntToastNotification function using the -AppId parameter._x000D__x000A_ * Thanks [@cedarbaum](https://github.com/cedarbaum)_x000D__x000A_* Enhancement: You can now specify a UniqueIdentifier when using the Remove-BTNotification function rather than component Tag and Group strings._x000D__x000A_* Fix: Weird edge cases when taking text from Twitch/IRC and using them in a toast is now sorted._x000D__x000A_ * Thanks [@potatoqualitee](https://github.com/potatoqualitee) and [@vexx32](https://github.com/vexx32)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix: Error when running Update-BTNotification on PowerShell 6.0+ (#120)_x000D__x000A_* Fix: Error when using actionable toast parameters on any version (#122)_x000D__x000A_* Fix: Multiple warnings about events not being supported when specifying multiple event types._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Add: AdaptiveGroups are now usable via New-BTColumn_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix: Toast alias removed in 0.8.0 has been restored_x000D__x000A_* Deprecation: Signalling removal of Shoulder Tap cmdlets in future version, v0.9.0_x000D__x000A_* Deprecation: Signalling removal of Path parameter from New-BTAudio in future version, v0.9.0. https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/windows-uwp/issues/1593_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 0.8.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix: Images from UNC path failing (#111)_x000D__x000A_* Add: Ability to force a Exposed via ActivatedAction and DismissedAction parameters on Submit-BTNotification and New-BurntToastNotification
